Submodules

dsa_helpers.ml.metrics module

Metric functions.

This module contains functions used to evaluate the performance of machine learning models.

dsa_helpers.ml.metrics.binary_dice_coefficient(eval_pred: tuple[ndarray, ndarray]) → dict[source]

Calculate the dice coefficient for binary masks. Developed for use in compute_metrics parameters of transformers Trainer class, for SegFormer senantic segmentation model of two classes.

Parameters:

eval_pred (tuple[np.ndarray, np.ndarray]) – A tuple containing the predicted and true masks.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the dice coefficient.

Return type:

dict

dsa_helpers.ml.metrics.mean_iou(eval_pred: tuple[ndarray, ndarray]) → dict[source]

Compute the mean intersection over union (IoU) for semantic segmentation. Also returns the IoU for each class.

Parameters:

eval_pred (tuple[numpy.ndarray, numpy.ndarray]) – Tuple of logits and labels.

Returns:

Dictionary of metrics.

Return type:

dict
